::Squizzy::

Squizzy nods. "It won't be too hard to fix ya up. Biggest part is 
taking out the program."

She smiles and walks to a table. "Lay right down and we can begin."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Vamprah::
> 
> "If its all that you like to know, Squizzy, May I sugest start with 
> the process?" said Vamprah
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ::Vamprah::
> > 
> > "You will see, Squizzy..."said Vamprah while she smiled 
> back "Someone 
> > inplanted me a program that will destroy my spark if someone else 
> > tried to reprogrammed me, plus other bot messed up my optics 
> circuits 
> > in order to I can't stand sunlight..."
> > 
> > "My optic circuits is not problem... every smart bot could fix it 
> > with a external gadget or working to fix the problem. But the 
> > program... its a menace of my spark I don't sure what other 
things 
> > could it do and I like it off my body before it show an 
unpleasant 
> > surprice."
> > 
> > "One chance that I have it's extract my spak, keep it in a 
> container, 
> > quit off that program and reimplant my spark in my body again... 
> any
